item.title: 中国发射对挑战马斯克 "星链 "至关重要的新型火箭

item.title: 安大略基金减记对 Northvolt 的 4 亿美元投资
item.description: 据熟悉内情的人士透露，安大略投资管理公司（Investment Management Corp. of Ontario）已经减记了对去年申请破产保护的电动汽车电池制造商 Northvolt AB 4 亿美元的投资。【原文：Investment Management Corp. of Ontario has written down its $400 million investment in Northvolt AB, the electric vehicle battery maker that filed for bankruptcy protection last year, according to people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: Reddit 将为与人工智能相关的 IPO 带来下一个重大盈利考验
item.description: Reddit 公司自去年上市以来一路高歌猛进，这让人们对该社交媒体平台周三的财报充满希望，投资者将密切关注该公司利用其独特内容达成人工智能许可交易的努力。【原文：Reddit Inc.’s blistering advance since it went public last year has inflated hopes for the social-media platform’s earnings Wednesday, and investors will be monitoring the firm’s efforts to leverage its unique content to strike AI licensing deals.】

item.title: Equinor 称欧盟可能需要额外 350 批液化天然气来补充储备
item.description: 据欧洲地区最大的液化天然气供应商之一称，欧洲今年可能需要额外吸引多达350船液化天然气，以补充其迅速枯竭的储存设施。【原文：Europe may need to attract as many as 350 extra cargoes of liquefied natural gas this year to refill its quickly depleting storage facilities, according to one of the region’s top suppliers of the fuel.】

item.title: 没有破产帮助，大麻产业面临债务重整
item.description: 如果像大多数在繁荣与萧条循环中处于劣势的公司一样，Schwazze 公司可以求助于美国破产法庭，在重新谈判债务的同时让债权人望而却步。但与大多数企业不同的是，它的产品--大麻--在联邦政府眼中仍然是非法的。【原文：If it were like most companies on the losing end of a boom and bust cycle, Schwazze could just turn to the US bankruptcy court to keep its creditors at bay while renegotiating its debt. But unlike most businesses, its product — marijuana — is still illegal in the eyes of the federal government.】

item.title: 鲍威尔告诉国会美联储仍不急于降息

item.title: 丹麦在美国人妖丑闻审判中获赔 5 亿美元
